Title.evidence: Randomised Controlled Trial on Training to Improve Diagnosis of Scaphoid Fracture Displacement

Trial_Design.evidence: In this randomised controlled trial, 64 orthopaedic surgeons were randomised

Intervention.evidence: training group received an online module before assessment

Objective.evidence: This study evaluates whether training can enhance interobserver reliability and diagnostic accuracy

Method_Outcome.evidence: Interobserver reliability was measured using Siegel’s multirater kappa

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: 64 orthopaedic surgeons were randomised into a training group (34) and a nontraining group (30)

Number_Randomised.evidence: 64 orthopaedic surgeons were randomised into a training group (34) and a nontraining group (30)

Result_Outcome.evidence: Sensitivity, specificity, and accuracy were 87%, 86%, and 87% for the training group
